author: Sara Wheeler
title: ‘Limits of the Known’ Review: What Is Left to Be Conquered
text:
In ‘Limits of the Known,’ writer and mountaineer David Roberts recounts stories of expeditions and climbing feats—his and other people’s—and dives into the murky waters of motivation. What, he asks, is risk? And for the first time in a long career of adventuring and writing, he faces the inner journey, when sickness strikes and there are no choices left.
Even the familiar tales in this book are gripping—wooden ships in the pincers of an ice floe, flickering oil lamps, thin air. Seven chapters and an interlude are arranged...
